00027 // <<< Use Configuration Wizard in Context Menu >>>
00028 
00029 /* Define to prevent recursive inclusion -------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00030 #ifndef __I2C_MASTER_CONFIG_H
00031 #define __I2C_MASTER_CONFIG_H
00032 
00033 /* Settings ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00034 //<q0> Enable Debug Mode
00035 // <i> Enable debug mode which output debug message to retarget.
00036 #define I2C_MASTER_DEBUG_MODE               (0)     /* 0:Disnable debug mode, 1:Enable debug mode.          */
00037 
00038 //<o0> Support I2C Master Channel
00039 //   <1=> 1
00040 //   <2=> 2
00041 //   <3=> 3
00042 //   <4=> 4
00043 // <i> I2C Master Channel
00044 #define I2C_MASTER_SUPPORT_CH               (1)     /* Support channel 1~4                                  */
00045 
00046 //<q0> Enable Master NACK Auto Retry
00047 // <i> Master NACK auto retry by I2CMaster_GetStatus().
00048 #define I2C_MASTER_NACK_AUTO_RETRY          (0)     /* Auto retry when NACK by I2CMaster_GetStatus()        */
00049 
00050 //<q0> Enable Clock Generated
00051 // <i> Master generates clock in the initialization phase.
00052 #define I2C_MASTER_INITIAL_BUS              (0)     /* Master generates clock in the initialization phase.  */
00053 
00054 //<e0> Enable I2C Hardware Time-out Mode Configuration
00055 // <i> The hardware time-out calculator is:
00056 // <i> F_PCLK = CK_AHB / (2 ^ I2CPCLK)    (I2CPCLK: APB Peripheral Clock Prescaler)
00057 // <i> F_I2CTO = F_PCLK / (2 ^ PSC)
00058 // <i> Time-out = TOUT / F_I2CTO
00059 //    <o1> Counter Prescaler Selection (2 ^ PSC)
00060 //       <0=> /1
00061 //       <1=> /2
00062 //       <2=> /4
00063 //       <3=> /8
00064 //       <4=> /16
00065 //       <5=> /32
00066 //       <6=> /64
00067 //       <7=> /128
00068 //     <i> F_I2CTO = F_PCLK / (2 ^ PSC)
00069 //    <o2> Counter Preload Value (TOUT) <1-0xFFFF:1>
00070 //     <i> Time-out = TOUT / F_I2CTO
00071 //     <i> TOUT range of (1 ~ 0xFFFF).
00072 //</e>
00073 #define I2C_MASTER_HW_TIMEOUT_MODE          (0)     /* 0: DISABLE, 1: ENABLE                                */
00074 #define I2C_MASTER_HW_TIMEOUT_DIV           (2)     /* Timeout Clock = TOUT / (Core Clock / (2 ^ I2C_MASTER_HW_TIMEOUT_DIV))  */
00075 #define I2C_MASTER_HW_TIMEOUT_BASE          (1000)  /* TOUT                                                 */
00076 
00077 //<e0> Enable I2C Software Time-out Mode Configuration
00078 // <i> The software time-out configuration is based on Interrupt or Tick mode.
00079 //    <o0> I2C Software Time-out Mode Selection
00080 //       <1=> Interrupt Mode
00081 //       <2=> Tick Mode
00082 //       <i> 1 = Interrupt Mode
00083 //       <i> 2 = Tick Mode
00084 //    <o1> Time-out Timer Base (Hz) <1-0xFFFFFFFF:1>
00085 //       <i> Please follow the external interrupt / tick source parameter.
00086 //       <i> (Tick refer to "ht32fxxxxx_conf.h")
00087 //</e>
00088 #define I2C_MASTER_SW_TIMEOUT_MODE          (0)     /* 1: Interrupt, 2: TimeTick                            */
00089 #define I2C_MASTER_SW_TIMEOUT_BASE          (1000)  /* Time-out Timer Base (Hz)                             */
00090 
00091 #endif

For complete information of HT32 Series 32-bit Microcontrollers platform visit Holtek Website
